short_description: Discover Belarus, a landlocked country in Eastern Europe known for its vast forests, Soviet-era architecture, and rich cultural heritage. Explore historic castles, pristine national parks, vibrant cities, and experience the unique blend of Eastern European traditions.

health.tap_water_safety: Generally safe in major cities, bottled water recommended in some areas
alcohol_info: It is prohibited to sell, serve, or offer alcohol beverages to anyone under the age of 18
Alcohol can be purchased from licensed venues, supermarkets, and shops
Alcohol sales are restricted during certain hours

tipping.hotels: Small tips for porters and housekeeping are appreciated
tipping.guides: 10% tip is appreciated for tour guides
tipping.restaurants: 10% tip is customary for good service, though not always expected
tipping.taxis: Rounding up the fare is common

weather.title: Belarus has a temperate continental climate with cold winters and warm summers. The country experiences significant seasonal variations, with cold, snowy winters and mild, pleasant summers.

when_to_visit.title: Summer
when_to_visit.short_description: Warm and pleasant temperatures perfect for exploring cities, visiting castles, and enjoying outdoor activities. Ideal time for hiking in national parks, sightseeing, and cultural festivals

when_to_visit.title: Spring & Autumn
when_to_visit.time_period: April to May, September to October
when_to_visit.short_description: Mild temperatures with beautiful seasonal colors. Perfect for sightseeing, exploring historic sites, and enjoying cultural attractions. Great time to visit castles and museums without the summer crowds

when_to_visit.title: Winter
when_to_visit.short_description: Cold and snowy conditions. Great for winter sports, experiencing traditional winter activities, and exploring cities with fewer tourists. Beautiful snow-covered landscapes

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Belarus is during the summer months from June to August when the weather is warm and pleasant, making it ideal for exploring cities, visiting castles, hiking in national parks, and enjoying outdoor activities
